name: BAR of CLEANING RPG Gamer Soap with d20 in soap - Geek Soaps and Nerdy Gifts From Deeply Dapper
description:
After a long day on the campaign, there's nothing better than having the innkeep bring up a tub of water, stripping out of your sweaty armor and pulling this Bar Of Cleaning out of the depths of your Bag Of Holding. You can feel your hit points regenerating as you lather up with this Unscented, gentle goat's milk handmade soap. And with an embedded 20 sided die in every bar, you know your bathing will be a Critical Hit with the ladies!

All of Deeply Dapper's soaps are handmade, with specially mixed scents and batches out of high quality, vegan friendly ingredients. This listing is for one 3oz bar of UNSCENTED soap with an actual D20 embedded in the center.

Buy More & Save HERE - https://www.etsy.com/listing/162187396/choose-any-four-geeky-soaps-from-deeply

You can see our full line of soaps here: http://www.etsy.com/shop/DapperSoaps

Interested in selling our Geek Soaps in your Comic Book Shop, Game Store or other retail establishment? Contact us at soap@deeplydapper.com. We offer wholesale pricing and a 100% guarantee on all of our products!

You can feel your hit points regenerating as you lather up with this gentle goat's milk soap. All of Deeply Dapper's soaps are handmade, with specially mixed scents and batches out of high quality, vegan friendly ingredients. This listing is for one 3oz bar of Highly Scented soap with an actual D20 embedded in the center. CURE LIGHT WOUNDS is scented to smell like old-school ointment with hints of peppermint, camphor, methol and just a touch of fruits. It's a very unique bar that we really like.

name: NECRONOMICON SOAP Lovecraft Collection Handmade Soap by Deeply Dapper
description:
Introducing a new line of handmade soaps inspired by the writings and worlds of H.P. LOVECRAFT!

Soap #3 - NECRONOMICON

Inspired by the Necronomicon itself, this scent is a quite masculine scent that brings to mind the desert and old books bound in leather in hearth-warmed libraries. Top notes of Basil, Hawthorn and Tonka Beans, strong middle notes of Suede, Sweet Amber and Spice, bound up in a book of Leather, Cedar and Almond.

Buy More & Save HERE - https://www.etsy.com/listing/162187396/choose-any-four-geeky-soaps-from-deeply

Interested in selling our Geek Soaps in your Comic Book Shop, Game Store or other retail establishment? Contact us at soap@deeplydapper.com. We offer wholesale pricing and a 100% guarantee on all of our products!

name: Lovecraft Collection of Handmade Soap - The Elder Thing, Dagon, Necronomicon and Cthulhu
description:
Introducing a new line of handmade soaps inspired by the writings and worlds of H.P. LOVECRAFT!

This listing includes one of each bar in the series in special retro packaging:
Soap #1 - THE ELDER THING

Inspired by the frigid Antarctic landscape of At The Mountains Of Madness and the Elder Things themselves, this scent is a thrilling and icily invigorating blend of Lemon, Wisteria, Peppermint, Spearmint, and Menthol, with a warm touch of Butter, Milk and Vanilla.

Soap #2 - DAGON

Inspired by the short story DAGON, this scent is a heady and mysteriously sweet blend of herbs, amber, fennel, anise, clove, cinnamon and nutmeg with a base of orange, almond, cherry and woods. Truly an unusual scent that we love.

Soap #3 - NECRONOMICON

Inspired by the Necronomicon itself, this scent is a quite masculine scent that brings to mind the desert and old books bound in leather in hearth-warmed libraries. Top notes of Basil, Hawthorn and Tonka Beans, strong middle notes of Suede, Sweet Amber and Spice, bound up in a book of Leather, Cedar and Almond.

Soap #4 - CTHULHU

"Iä! Iä! Cthulhu fhtagn! Ph’nglui mglw’nafh Cthulhu R’lyeh wgah-nagl fhtagn—"

A truly green scent - simple, with some surprising touches. Top notes of flowering Lilac with a middle hint of pure vanilla bean, writhing on a base of rich English Ivy.

Each bar is approximately 3.5oz and is wrapped in our deluxe old-school paper packaging. 

You can see our full line of soaps here: http://www.etsy.com/shop/DapperSoaps

Interested in selling our Geek Soaps in your Comic Book Shop, Game Store or other retail establishment? Contact us at soap@deeplydapper.com. We offer wholesale pricing and a 100% guarantee on all of our products!

name: THE DUDE SOAP Big Lebowski Soap from Deeply Dapper
description:
Careful, Man - There's a beverage scented soap here! Our Big Lebowski inspired bar of soap features a bowling ball on the front and a bar of White Russian Scented soap on the inside. Luscious tones of coffee, cream and alcohol. 

All of Deeply Dapper's Geeky Soaps are handmade with custom scents out of the highest quality, vegan friendly ingredients. Our bars are highly scented but use gentle ingredients and just a touch of artificial coloring. This Cult Classic inspired bar of Nerdy soap weighs approximately 3oz.

name: Big Lebowski Persian Rug Light Switch Plate
description:
A switchplate that will really tie your room together.

This plate has a professionally printed image, plastic laminated for durability and water resistance, in case you happen to get a visit from a thug and mounted to a textured and painted jumbo sized switchplate. It measures 3.5" x 5.25"

Also includes painted screws to mount your plate. Photos are representative of this design, but each plate is made by hand, one at a time, so variations in texture and appearance may occur.

All Deeply Dapper Switchplates are now mailed, swaddled in bubble wrap and in a sturdy box to assure the safest arrival of your item possible!

name: In Case Of Zombies Break Glass Key Hook
description:
Looks like it may be too late already! Better grab your conveniently easy to find keys (Thanks to this key hook) and your machete and get out of town!

LIKE US ON FACEBOOK to win prizes, keep up to date on sales and promotions and discuss all things geek - facebook.com/deeplydapper

The plaque, handmade from reclaimed, irregular and second-use wood, measures 5"x7" with a professionally printed, laminated and permanently mounted image. It is also coated in a weather resistant sealant for the ultimate protection from Zombies. Please note that all plaques are entirely handmade, so some variations and small defects may occur and may not look exactly like the key hook pictured.

This listing is for one Key Hook, available with Two Straight Elbow Hooks. It also includes a COMMAND 3M hanging system and instructions for care and hanging. (Standard Cup hooks are also available upon request - See the Zelda Key Hook Listing for example. If you would prefer that style, please contact us after purchasing your hook.)

This item is made to order and ships in 4-10 business days.

name: Tentacle Auto Decal
description:
A little bit of the DEEP for your vehicle. Large vinyl sticker of Deeply Dapper's Tentacle. This is the little fellow that adorns all of our boxes and stationery. (He's the Kraken's cousin because, Nepotism, but he's pretty photogenic too!)

Made from medium weight adhesive vinyl, this sticker is made to last through thick and thin. Also great for decorating inside - laptops, e-readers, anything can sport your belief in the existence of the deep ones.

Each order contains one sticker and instructions for application and is available in the LARGE version of the Tentacle, which stands 6" tall and is 3" wide or the SMALL version, standing 3.5" tall and is 2" wide If you order multiple stickers, or would like a mirror image of the decal, please contact me!



Commissions and custom work is also available - kraken@deeplydapper.com
